#summary URI dereferencing: implementation status
#labels org.mmisw.ont

This page is intended to describe the level of compliance of the current implementation according to the dereferencing specification located at [http://marinemetadata.org/apguides/ontprovidersguide/ontguideconstructinguris Constructing URIs for Ontologies].



= Status of current implementation =

   * Handling of the accept header
   * Handling of the file extension
   * Handling of the "form" parameter
   * "form" parameter (if given) takes precedence over file extension.

Some examples using http://mmisw.org/ont/cf/parameter

   * http://mmisw.org/ont/cf/parameter
   * http://mmisw.org/ont/cf/parameter.owl
   * http://mmisw.org/ont/cf/parameter.rdf
   * http://mmisw.org/ont/cf/parameter.html
   * http://mmisw.org/ont/cf/parameter.n3

Terms are temporarily resolved in HTML format: 
   * http://mmisw.org/ont/cf/parameter/water_vapor_pressure

Parameter "_debug" can be used temporarily for debugging purposes:
   * http://mmisw.org/ont/cf/parameter?_debug
